mainText:
Steve was a genius, a innovator, and also a good person, I will always remember him, the man who invent the Mac, the iphone,the ipod, and the ipad, and a lot of more things. I wished to meet with him, but unfortunately I will never can do it.

My sincere condolences to Steve Jobsâ€™ family.
header: Steve: the man I will never forget
author: Junior
